title: Halloween chocolate chip spider cookies
ingredients: ['300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '225g unsalted butter, at room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '165g soft brown sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '425g dark chocolate chips, divided']
